Articles.Content:
Hey!

Just downloaded the full game earlier today, was playing the demo for a while but it just didn't cut it! I was looking at all the stuff people were doing on youtube, like building bases on the Mun and stuff and wanted to do likewise!

Can anyone tell me what the story is with the career mode? I tried playing it earlier but it wouldn't let me?

Career mode isn't developed yet. The ground work for career mode is being lain as we speak in development.

Welcome aboard!
Welcome to the crew! and as rage said, Career mode isn't implemented yet. But fro now make rockets with all the new parts and get to the mun!

Welcome to the community Biker Joe

Career is coming, eventually, keep an eye on the dev blogs and KSP weeklies for news
